title: Bookmark toolbar dropdown menu does not always display bookmarks
content:
I have a problem with the bookmarks toolbar. If I display a dropdown menu and then move the mouse pointer over the menu entries, the next level of entries for a folder are not displayed. This doesn't apply to all the folders, some display the next level, some do not. This problem is getting progressively worse. All the entries are present on 'Bookmark Management' I use the latest version of Firefox on the latest version of Ubuntu.

I sync the bookmarks between several devices, the toolbar works properly on the other devices. (Ubuntu, Mac OS, Android)
creator: billio

title: se me borro todo
content: Entre hoy al explorador y se me abia borrado todo el historial y los marcadores guardados
creator: dc.camargo09

title: App Store doesn't say HOW to get  VPN installer for IOS
content: I have installed the VPN on my laptop. But when I go to App Store to get it for IPhone and IPad, there is nothing but a description and pictures, but nothing to click on to actually get the connection.........can anyone help? thanks
creator: jschirle

title: Latest iOS version update no longer lets me pick alternate search engines at the bottom toolbar
content: I am an avid Firefox user (desktop and mobile) and until recently, on the mobile ios browser, I was easily able to change from my default duckduckgo search engine to an alternate if I needed more oomph. This option is now gone. I see other people commenting on this too in the App Store reviews. I really want this back - I don’t want to change from DuckDuckGo but there are a lot of times it’s helpful to use google, and having to copy my search, go to google.com and paste it, is annoying, when I used to have the easy option of clicking in the search bar and then picking google on the bottom toolbar.
creator: Glencora

title: Fonts too small in menu bars, drop downs, tabs, etc.
content:
Mozilla must be run by 20 somethings who don't realize many computer users have been using them for longer than they've been alive. As a result we are needing to be able to change the WAY TOO SMALL text in the menu bar, drop downs, tabs etc. Now that Font Size and Color Changer no longer works, is there a way to increase those fonts? If not, why don't they add that feature to the next version?

Is there a way to increase those fonts or do I need to go back to Safari?

SE
creator: eulea

title: Perdi mis contraseñas y marcadores al reestablecer Firefox Desktop (a pesar que decia que no los perderia)
content:
Estaba teniendo algunas fallas del navegador al no poder cargar bien el Google Drive ni Gmail, y tenia que quedarme en un pestaña para que cargara si me iba a otra pestaña mientras cargaba no hacia nada

Decidi reinstalar Firefox y al iniciar sesión de nuevo habia perdido todas mis contraseñas, pero podia utilizar el autocompletar campos

Luego desparecieron los marcadores pero podia verlos en la configuración mas no en la barra, decidi restaurar por sugernecia del programa y aunque indicaba que no se perderían datos, igual los perdí junto con el autocompletado

Afortunadamente pude extraer la contraseñas y marcadores a tiempo, porque tambien se perdieron de mi cuenta

Tengos los archivos de respaldo pero no puedo restaurar los marcadores (son bastantes) ni sesiones (son 300)

Agradecido
creator: mpicon

title: Possible mozilla email scam
content: I received an email claiming that my account has been breached on LinkedIn. I do not have an account with LinkedIn. What do I do?
creator: n8wjq

title: Uninstalling update
content: I just installed the 'Mailcheck' version (mailcom_Firefox_Setup_64.exe)... Is there anyway to 'roll back' the update? Or do I have to uninstall and reinstall Firefox?
creator: MikeCarr1

title: Saved log in
content: Recently (on two machines) Firefox has been showing the 'Update Password' pop-up for saved log ins. If I ignore it all is well, but the password in the box is not the one originally saved. If I save it I can see a randomly generated password which is, obviously, invalid for that site. If I have multiple log-ins it gets very confusing as some users will hit save thinking 'that's ok' and others won't. If I disable 'ask to save log-ins' it doesn't populate the ones already saved. Currently my only option is to cancel the 'update' pop-up every time which is annoying and confusing. I've cleared the cache for several sites to no avail. Any thoughts?
creator: essenjay68
